extendedInfo.description: Developed from the ground up by Dabalistic Software to take full advantage of mobile hardware, ZAP brings you all the excitement of console quality first person shooter gaming on your handheld device. We have used the latest optimization techniques to provide a 60 frames per second experience and support any device with Android v2.2 or higher and OpenGL ES 2.0.Zombie Attack Protocol will test your skill for casual and hardcore players. Try our demo and see if you have got what it takes to survive the full game.Features Include:- Fully Real-Time 3D Engine- Megatextured Environment- Advanced Shader Effects- Multiple Enemies and Bosses- 3D Surround Sound- Intuitive Touch Screen Controls- Intense Action and GameplayThink you have what it takes to get further?Get the full game here for only 59p:http://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.dabalistic.zapVisit our official website:http://www.zombieattackprotocol.co.uk- Join our community and help us decide on the future of your experience!- Look out for new content, features, levels and updates.NEW FORUMS | NEW MAPS? | The Future is yours!

reviews.title: Fun
reviews.comment: It\'s fun but way to short :-[
reviews.author: Keith Pickett

reviews.title: Poop app
reviews.comment: The demo sucks and where are the gun sights?
reviews.author: Daniel Heyes
